content: published as holly-day no a-798 in coats & clark s book no 197 priscilla® doilies 1 1969 was also available as a free leaflet *c * 1960 **gauge ** rounds 1-5 = 2 inches doily may be made with a white main section or red/white/green **amount ** **ca** 1 400 yd ball of white or 1 300yd ball red/white/green **cb** 1 350 yd ball green **cc** 1 350 yd ball red pattern number 0146-2c 3 stars intermediate 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/coats--clark-197-priscilla-doilies
